metadata.name: smoking my heart out
metadata.description:
sometimes you have to let go of all the things that that don't let you grow and continue on your way to feel in a new chapter: situations, emotions, and even people you love sometimes stay in another chapter of the movie of your life, so you have to smoke your heart out to remember all the past with joy...

this work is a self portrait 
digitally retouched and animated 
made with Sony A7iii and Adobe Photoshop

*collector gets the original piece in a 10x10" acrylic*
